sources.title: The Green Hornet Strikes Again! (1941) 15-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 15-chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: Warren Hull, Kye Luke, Anne Nagel
Directors: Ford Beebe & John Rawlins

Wealthy publisher Britt Reid and his trusted valet disguise themselves as crime-fighting vigilantes to battle the growing power of a ruthless crime lord! 

üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00      PizzaFLIX Intro
01:05     CHAPTER 1:  Flaming Havoc
21:45     CHAPTER 2:  The Plunge of Peril
43:04     CHAPTER 3:  The Avenging Heavens
1:04:41  CHAPTER 4:  A Night of Terror
1:24:02  CHAPTER 5:  Shattering Doom
1:43:00  CHAPTER 6:  The Fatal Flash
2:04:31  CHAPTER 7:  Death in the Clouds
2:21:53  CHAPTER 8:  Human Targets
2:42:15  CHAPTER 9:  The Tragic Crash
3:01:49  CHAPTER 10: Blazing Fury
3:20:48  CHAPTER 11: Thieves of the Night
3:39:07  CHAPTER 12: Crashing Barriers
3:58:04  CHAPTER 13: The Flaming Inferno
4:15:54 CHAPTER 14:  Smashing the Crime Ring
4:36:59 CHAPTER 15:  Peace in the Jungle
4:56:04 Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: Wealthy publisher Britt Reid and his trusted Asian servant disguise themselves as the super-hero The Green Hornet and his faithful servant Kato as they battle the growing power of a ruthless secret crime organization that deals with foreign powers. The identity of the syndicate's leader remains a mystery.
metadata.Writer: George H. Plympton, Basil Dickey, Sherman L. Lowe
metadata.Actors: Warren Hull, Wade Boteler, Anne Nagel
